name: Easy, Excellent Baked Flounder
author: ahnjy
summary: This is a great recipe for a night when you're feeling lazy - only a few ingredients, nothing to chop, easy cleanup, and very yummy! My husband announced the fish was 'excellent,' and he's not usually one to rave about food.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil and coat with cooking spray
Rinse flounder fillets, pat dry, and place on the baking sheet
Whisk butter and wine together in a bowl; pour over flounder
Sprinkle each fillet with bread crumbs and then paprika
Bake in the preheated oven until flounder flakes easily with a fork, 25 to 30 minutes
